sourcesContent:
import './PlayerBar.less' import {formatTime} from '../../../../utils/format' import {debounce} from '../../../../utils/tool' import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import { connect, useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { Slider } from 'antd'; function FootPlay () { const [isPlaying, setIsPlaying] = useState(false);//是否播放状态 const [progress, setProgress] = useState(0);//播放进度条 const [duration, setDuration] = useState(0);//音乐总时长 const [currentTime, setCurrentTime] = useState(0);//播放时间 const audioRef = useRef(null); const { currentSong } = useSelector((state) => ({/**从redux仓库里面获得数据 */ currentSong: state.player.currentSong })); // console.log("currentSong") // console.log(currentSong) useEffect(() => { //代替原有的类组件声明周期 // audioRef.current.src = getSongPlayUrl(currentSong.id) audioRef.current.src = currentSong.al.src; audioRef.current?.pause();return false audioRef.current?.play().then(() => { setIsPlaying(true) console.log("播放歌曲成功！") }).catch((err) => { setIsPlaying(false) console.log('歌曲播放失败：', err) }) setDuration(currentSong.dt)//将总时间赋值 }, [currentSong]) function handlePlayBtnClick () {//点击暂停|播放 isPlaying ? audioRef.current?.pause() : audioRef.current?.play().catch(() => setIsPlaying(false)) setIsPlaying(!isPlaying) } function handleTimeUpdate () {//进度条 const currentTime = audioRef.current.currentTime*1000 const progress = ((currentTime) / duration) * 100 setProgress(progress) setCurrentTime(currentTime) } function handleSliderChanged(value){//点击进度条加载 const currentTime = (value/100)*duration audioRef.current.currentTime=currentTime/1000 setCurrentTime(currentTime) } return (
上一首 播放/暂停 下一首
{currentSong?.al?.name} {currentSong?.name}
{formatTime(currentTime)} / {formatTime(duration)}
画中画歌词 收藏 分享
已添加到播放列表 0
循环
) } export default FootPlay
